name: Imaris Parser
title: Imaris Parser
description: Parses metadata of Imaris files and outputs features in organized csv format.
author: Melanie Parham (melanie.parham@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpdir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

outputs.name: metaoutdir
outputs.description: Metadata directory that stores overall data

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin
